panels.description: uration from the time request is processed to the time events are published. This metric is calculated per event by following formula(PublishedTime - ProcessedTime)/CountEvents
panels.title: Worker Processing Duration

panels.description: Duration from the time request is received to the time events are published. This metric is calculated per event by following formula(PublishedTime - ReceivedTime)/CountEvents
panels.title: Server Processing Latency

panels.description: Duration from the time request is sent to the time events are published. This metric is calculated per event by following formula (PublishedTime - SentTime)/CountEvents
panels.title: Event Processing Duration

panels.description: Duration from when the request is received to when the request is processed. High value of this metric indicates the publisher is slow.
panels.title: Batch idle time

panels.description: Total byte received in requests
panels.title: Data Ingested per minute

panels.description: Request count
panels.title: Batches read per minute

panels.description: Number of events received in requests
panels.title: Events Ingested per minute

panels.description: Number of duplicate events
panels.title: Duplicate Events

panels.description: Time taken from event being consumed from the queue to being acked by the ack handler.
panels.title: Event Round Trip Time

panels.description: Time difference between ack function called by producer and processing by the ack handler.
panels.title: Ack Latency

panels.description: Bytes of allocated heap objects
panels.title: Heap (Allocated)

panels.description: in-use spans of heap in bytes
panels.title: Heap (In Use)

panels.description: Number of allocated heap objects
panels.title: Objects in Heap

panels.description: Bytes in stack spans
panels.title: Stack Size (In Use)

panels.description: Number of goroutine spawn in a single flush
panels.title: Goroutine Count

panels.description: Number of successful connections established to the server (per minute)
panels.title: Successful Connections

panels.description: Number of failed connections established to the server (per minute)
panels.title: Failed Connections

panels.description: Number of alive connections
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: Duration of alive connection per session per connection
panels.title: User Session Duration

panels.description: Number of connection close errors encountered
panels.title: Connection Close errors

panels.description: Total ping that server fails to send (per minute)
panels.title: Ping Failure

panels.description: Total pong that server fails to send (per minute)
panels.title: Pong Failure

panels.description: Response time of produce batch method of the kafka producer
panels.title: Average Produce Time

panels.description: Number of events delivered to Kafka.
panels.title: Events delivered

panels.description: Number of events not delivered to Kafka.
panels.title: Undelivered Events

panels.description: Number of delivery failures (per-minute) caused by non-existent topics
panels.title: Unknown Topic Errors

panels.description: Total number of requests sent to Kafka brokers
panels.title: Requests sent to Brokers

panels.description: Total number of bytes transmitted to Kafka brokers
panels.title: Data transfer to brokers

panels.description: Broker latency / round-trip time in milliseconds
panels.title: Broker round trip time

panels.description: Number of events delivered to PubSub.
panels.title: Delivered Events

panels.description: Number of events that were not delivered to PubSub.
panels.title: Undelivered Events

panels.description: Number of delivery failures caused by non-existence of topic in PubSub.
panels.title: Unknown Topic Errors

panels.description: Number of delivery failures caused by exceeding throughput limits on PubSub.
panels.title: Topic Throughput exceeded errors

panels.description: Number of delivery failures caused by exceeding the limit on number of Topics on PubSub.
panels.title: Topic Limit exceeded errors

panels.description: Response time of produce batch method of the pubsub producer
panels.title: Average Produce Time

panels.description: Number of events successfully delivered to Kinesis.
panels.title: Events Delivered

panels.description: Number of events not delivered to Kinesis.
panels.title: Undelivered Events

panels.description: Number of delivery failures caused by non-existence of stream in Kinesis.
panels.title: Unknown Stream Errors

panels.description: Number of delivery failures caused by exceeding shard throughput limits. This error can also occur if the message size of an event exceeds message size limit
panels.title: Stream Throughput exceeded errors

panels.description: Number of delivery failures caused due to too many streams in CREATING mode. AWS Kinesis limits how many stream creation requests can be submitted in parallel to 5.
panels.title: Stream Limit exceeded errors

panels.description: Response time of produce batch method of the kinesis producer
panels.title: Average Produce Time
